sub_title: Design and Scale-up of Green Technologies | Manager Operations
summary:
Driving change and building organizations is my passion.❤️‍🔥 I enjoy connecting people, digitization  and business processes in a multicultural environment. I have lived, studied and worked in China, Hong Kong, Argentina, Austria and the Netherlands. These experiences have helped me to better understand and bridge cultural and interdisciplinary gaps.

Passionate and learning about and trying to implement new organizational models inspired by Frederic Laloux’s “Reinventing organizations” and Ricardo Semmler “Semco style”. 🧠♻️

In both my personal and professional life I like to contribute to resolving the major challenges of our time such as the climate crisis & energy transition, inequality & creating more equal opportunities for everyone.

At TransitionHero we are designing and scaling up Green Technologies.💚 Helping our organization grow so we can increase our impact on improving our environment.🌍

Would you like to be part of this mission? Then please reach out 👍🏽

awards.title: X-Culture best student award
awards.description:
Award for the 100 best students of the X-culture project.
The X-culture project had 4088 participating students working on a business case in a cross-cultural virtual team of 8 students from all over the world. Our goal was to advise a company how they should execute their market-expansion strategy in Europe. 
My role was project-leader and our team consisted out of students from Brazil, Columbia, India, Malaysia, Netherlands, and the United States.

awards.title: Challenge Programme
awards.description: Successfully participated in this Honours program for 20 high-achieving students. The programme offers the opportunity to broaden and enrich the student's knowledge and skills beyond the regular programme of study by a range of activities.

awards.title: International Ambassador
awards.description: Award for the student who contributed most to the international character of Avans School of International Studies by his/her intercultural social communicative qualities and personality. This student builds bridges between people of different nationalities, adds value to the culture of Avans School of International Studies and puts effort in integration.

profile_positions.description:
Developing and executing our growth strategy, in order to increase our GreenTech impact. This involves:
- Structure the internal organisation for growth, raving clients and happy team members, including all systems, procedures and methods (HR, PR, Sales, Legal, Finance Quality Control).
- Take care of our internal organisation and make sure it is running smoothly and efficiently.
- Maintain and expand our great company culture, being responsible for human resources including recruitment, onboarding new employees, strategic personnel planning, salary structure, oversee coaching and organise trainings.
- Business development, finding more awesome projects to work on and partners to work with
- Coordinate our PR and communication activities, including our website, branding, events, and social media.
- Managing our IT tooling portfolio, software development and cybersecurity
- Support in finance, including project budgets and forecasts
profile_positions.title: Manager Operations
Business Manager Hong Kong - New Energies and LNG department

profile_positions.description:
- Project Manager and Product Owner
Responsible for global implementation and change management of safety management software. Objective is to make sure the tool supports our business, improve and further embed the user buy-in & global usage of this system.  Enabling world class safety management with support of the system, ensuring the system gets used and developed in the most efficient and innovative manner. 

- Developing and implementing a new global safety improvement program  
Building the program from idea to concept and now developing a new global standard. 
Making sure tools (software and mobile application) to support our safety improvement program are developed and implemented. This includes travelling, training, support and project management.

- Performance management
Develop and implement global performance management by setting KPI's and making sure the right tooling and systems are in place to support this process.
profile_positions.title: Operations Officer - Global Operations at Vopak
Management Trainee
Business Analyst
Intern Channel Marketing - Thesis on New Product Introduction
Sales and Marketing Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Helping (new) international students integrate, find their way, and learn about Dutch culture during their studies in the Netherlands.
Supporting local teenagers with finding their next step upon graduating from secondary school.
Supporting a person who fled from his home country, mentoring and helping to find their way and getting a suitable job in the Netherlands.
